nodes.text: An air taxi was a repulsorlift-powered airspeeder used as a passenger transport on worlds such as Coruscant and Malastare. Landspeeders that served as taxis were known as taxi speeders or repulsorcabs.

One of the most common types of air taxi was the EasyRide passenger airspeeder, also known as the Coruscant Taxi due to its frequent use on the galactic capital during the time of the Galactic Republic. Another type of air taxi was the Void Spider TX-3 Air Taxi.
